item.title: Nvidia Slide on Broadcom-OpenAI Pact Threatens $4 Trillion Value
item.description: Nvidia Corp. shares fell on Friday, with the chipmaker at risk of losing its historic $4 trillion valuation for the first time in nearly two months.

item.title: Broadcom to Help OpenAI Create AI Chip to Take On Nvidia
item.description: Broadcom Inc. is helping OpenAI design and produce an artificial intelligence accelerator from 2026, getting into a lucrative sphere dominated by Nvidia Corp.

item.title: Broadcom Earnings Run Headlong Into Stock’s $730 Billion Rally
item.description: Investors worried about faltering momentum in the artificial intelligence trade are looking for a spark from Thursday’s earnings report by the world’s hottest chipmaker: Broadcom Inc.
